name: COALITION TO PROTECT AND PROMOTE ASSOCIATION HEALTH PLANS (INFORMAL COALITION)
sampleDescriptions: Educate Congressional staff about legal, policy, and practical issues relating to health plans sponsored by a group or association of employers (known as an "Association Health Plan" or "AHP"). Advoca
